content: of them together at a time with a whip stitch along the edge this makes them thicker and nicer after sewing them together you should have 4 feet beak use a 4 mm hook make 1 round 1 chain 6 turn 6 round 2 start from second chain from hook 5 single_crochet chain 1 treat the chains you made earlier as if you are crocheting in the round and do 4 single_crochet then 1 increase 12 rounds 3-6 single_crochet in all 12 st 12 fasten_off leave a long tail for sewing tail use a 4 mm hook make 1 round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase in all 6 stitches 12 round 3 increase in next st single_crochet in next st x 6 18 rounds 4-10 single_crochet all 18 stitches 18 round 11 decrease in the next st single_crochet in the next st x 6 12 attachment tips attach the beak with a slight curve right in the middle of the face flatten and sew on the tail slightly above the middle section © 2022 unicornia / allison barnes
